params.name: bookingId
params.doc: ID of the booking to be canceled.

params.name: options
params.doc: An object representing the available options for canceling a booking.

description: The `cancelBooking()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the specified booking is canceled.
Canceling a booking causes the following changes:
- The participant is removed from the session.
- If the booking creates a session, the session that was created is deleted from the calendar.
- The participant is notified, according to the `participantNotification` properties.
When `cancelBooking()` is invoked, the cancellation is validated against the service's bookings policy.
If `cancelBooking()` is invoked by a Bookings Admin, the service's bookings policy can be ignored by setting `ignoreCancellationPolicy` to `true`.
> Only users with the **Bookings Admin** [role](https://support.wix.com/en/article/roles-permissions-overview#bookings-admin) can cancel other customers' bookings.

members.name: participantNotification
members.doc: Whether to notify the participants about the booking confirmation, and an optional custom message.

members.name: flowControlSettings
members.doc: Sets the cancel booking flow behavior.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: When `true`, prevents permission checks from running for the operation.

docs.summary: Sets the cancel booking flow behavior.

members.name: ignoreCancellationPolicy
members.doc:
Whether to ignore the service's cancellation policy.
<!--ONLY:REST
 Requires BOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY permission.
<!--END:ONLY:REST-->       
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
 Requires "Manage Wix Bookings App" and "Manage Bookings' Calendar" [roles](https://support.wix.com/en/article/roles-permissions-overview#bookings-admin).
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->
